# Git Basic Command

## Initialize
git init <project-name> : Initialize an empty Git repository

## Clone
git clone <url> : Clone a repository from the specified URL

## Add and Commit
git add <file-name> : Add the specified file to the staging area
git add . : Add all files in the current directory to the staging area
git commit -m "<commit-message>" : Commit the changes to the local repository

## Status
git status : Show the status of the repository and any changes

## Log
git log : Show the commit history of the repository

## Branch
git branch <branch-name> : Create a new branch with the specified name
git branch -l : List all branches in the repository
git checkout <branch-name> : Switch to the specified branch
git checkout -b <branch-name> : Create a new branch and switch to it

## Remote
git remote add <name> <url> : Add a remote repository
git remote -v : List all remote repositories
git fetch <remote-name> : Fetch the latest changes from the remote repository
git pull <remote-name> <branch-name> : Fetch and merge the latest changes from the remote repository

## Merge
git merge <branch-name> : Merge the specified branch into the current branch

## Reset
git reset <commit-hash> : Reset the local repository to the specified commit
git reset --hard <commit-hash> : Reset the local repository and staging area to the specified commit

## Diff
git diff : Show the differences between the staging area and the local repository
git diff <commit-hash> : Show the differences between the specified commit and the staging area

## Tag
git tag <tag-name> : Create a new tag with the specified name
git tag : List all tags in the repository

## Pull
git pull <remote-name> <branch-name> : Fetch and merge the latest changes from the remote repository

## Push
git push <remote-name> <branch-name> : Push the local branch to the remote repository

## Pull Request
git request-pull : Create a pull request for the current branch to the specified remote branch

## Changelog
git changelog : Generate a changelog from the commit history
